channel.title: List of RSCD Bugs/Missing features
channel.description:
With the help of the community for RSCAngel, over the past 6 months they have helped tally up the missing [b]F2P[/b] content, and bugs.
Since RSCAngel is a F2P (free version) replicate in progress, of RSC. this list does not contain any P2P stuff, it will contain both full F2P, and shared features/bugs between f2p/p2p
Note: this is not everything, i'm sure theres still bugs/missing features F2P out there that i haven't got to yet, but heres a nice list of what RSCDaemon lacks (from the original)
[b]-----RSCD bugs------[/b]
huge RSCD memory leak (hint, Tile[][]) fix the dupes that are around (forgot which ones) fix 'autocatching'/auto following them after a wildy fight. fix beers, to only go -1 atk level. wine 3 allow 2 people to mine and get ore at the same time, if they mine before the rock goes empty Fix rarely when walking to NPC's or an object it would just stand there, and not execute what it was going to do when ranging then clicking another npc to range while your ranging, would just stop you (fix to attack new target) decrease prayer drain speed by 20% fix the 'disconnect' problems in crowded areas Speed up trading to stop the lag fix not being able to range over water/lava & up/down mountains etc
[b]-------Missing Features------------[/b]
add the death sound to when you die add the 'underattack' sound in Aggressive monsters should follow you 4-6 tiles after you run from a fight. when touching zamorak wine, allow you to actually take it if everyone are dead, if not make them attack you add a captcha for fatigue add brother jerred to bless holy symbols make damage happen when the ranged/magic missile actually hits the target, not instantly. move banker 1 tile away if standing on him when talking (so your both on a separate tile facing each other) RE-DO falador barmaid, more RSC-like certain NPC's run from combat on low health synchronize the hit damage in fights more RSC-like when ranging/maging NPC's make them run and attack you shortbow and crossbows have a lower range distance When ranging, you should face the NPC different sounds when fighting undead/armored NPCs add stock system (shop prices vary depending on stock) make NPC <> Player chat's show to everyone around you (only above heads) when 2 rangers shoot 1 person at the same time in wilderness, 1 of their damages gets canceled out split XP between each person depending on the damage they dealt to an NPC disallowed following until 3 seconds after the person to follow has left combat better magic formula (more accuracy/damage on higher magic points) path validations for missiles (ranged/maging through walls etc) When you eat cabbage its supposed to say: "You eat the Cabbage. Yuck!" you get exp from mining gems set prayer drain to drain slower depending on your prayer points you should be able to attack someone who is mining. you should continue mining when getting attacked by an NPC NPC's cant finish their walking path if a NPC is in the way NPC's can't finish their walking path if a player is in the way Player's cant finish their walking path if an (Aggressive) NPC is in the way Npcs face players, players face NPCs when interacting with each other make wyson sell you woad leaves make wizards mind bomb allow 31 magic to equip rune plate When mining, it should use the highest level pickaxe that you meet the mining requirements to. (example when u have a rune and iron pickaxe in ur inventory, it always tries to use rune pickaxe, even when ur not 41 mining) Make "approach" tree, damage you for the trees in Draynor. Make door to phoenix gangs hideout work. Allow teleporting during combat Make fat tony a shop, and sell pizza bases Make a general store in bandit camp in wilderness, selling general items for free. Add Crumble undead. Make the banan guy work on karamja Add all Confuse type of spells Make Apothcary work Make dummy's work Allow cooked meat to be cooked again and burn the meat Make grape+jug of water = wine/bad wine Make wine/bad wine drinkable Make dyes mixable, and adding to capes. setup Aggie to make you dyes. Added flour/pizza base making with bucket/jug of water. Added full pizza making Original items are given to new characters add customs officer with the original text on karamaja to go back to port sarim cooking guild hopper is now working. when you steal a phoenix crossbow, the weaponmaster will attack you now Make Delrith not attackable search Drain, say you see a key but cannot quite reach it cant close chest upstairs fallly chain place not allow leaving karamaja with karamaja rum (includes teleporting) add cupboard searching top floor of morgan's house in draynor, you are suppose to obtain garlic when searching the cabinet can now use apple/cookedmeat/redberries with pie shell, to create uncooked pie. can now use pastry dough with pie dish add pastry dough making add bluerite ore mining disallow ranged/magic against delrith. cant fill bowls with water at sinks wells or fountains only suppose to be able too cook bread, pie, cake, and pizzas on range. can use certain dyes on goblin armour add muddy key chest that can be unlocked and has items add stew and cake making add pastry dough to the menu of water on flour.
[b]----------XMl data stuff-----------[/b]
ghosts drop no loot Spawn tomato and cheese in bandit camp add bartender upstairs of dalador bar Add shop (barmaid for falador and upstairs) to sell dwarven stouts, beer, wizard mind bombs. make black knights and ghosts agressive in wildy Add rune pickaxe to the pickaxe shop in dwarven mines. Add addy legs, helmet to their correct shops Add missing champion guild stairs/ladders, and allow access to it. Add Rune mace, dagger, short and long to the champs guild guy Add purple cape, addy chest, black large and legs, to the girl in champs guild. Add black chest plate to varrock armor shop (if its not already there) Add highway man to south falador Add highway man to drop black capes remove access to spiders at kbd lair Make both Varrock bartenders sell beer. Spawn WeaponMaster in Phoenix Gang hideout Spawn Phoenix Crossbow in the gang's hideout. Make WeaponMaster and Highwayman aggressive add rune legs and chain to scavvo in champs guild remove addy legs from horvik johnny the beard should drop a scroll Steel short should spawn in 68,326. remove gem trader added maze key drops to chaos dwarfs added rune med drops to lessers add General Bentnoze & General Wartface to goblin village there are suppose to bears walking around lumby forest, between lumb and draynor. Added skull to darkwizard spawn up near zamorak monks add random wizard walking around near highwayman near fally chickens add another highway man just above draynor added plank and tile spawn to wildy added crossbow spawn to wildy missing egg spawn (119,603) Battle Axe Shop in Port Sarim (Brian) is suppose to sell Addy Battle Axes as well Black larges/meds were NOT sold in helmet shop in barb village. same with black legs/skirts were NOT sold in skirt/leg shops in Al Kharid. add iron dagger to lumby house there was a spider (level8) in that little hut east from Draynor Village jail add one lvl 7 goblin near Lumby castle (north-west), between castle and sheeps mugger should be near Varrock south-west digsite (if it's not already there, not sure) there were two spiders (lvl 8, not 100% sure) - one between Draynor Manor and Falador and the other one in that little hut east from Draynor Village jail add one lvl 7 goblin near Lumby castle (north-west), between castle and sheeps add 2 lesser demons south of greaters add raw herring/pike to port sarim fish store change jug and grape respawn time to 30 sec in cooking guild add addy short, long, dagger to varrock sword shop add addy med/large to peksa shop, and legs to louie legs unicorns still drop horns that cant be picked up (shouldnt be dropped at all) (leaving this here, since P2P is incoming) Lessers should be south of nature respawn, not southeast of greaters The bandits with names aren’t aggressive when they should be Iron bar respawn missing from lvl 16 wild above arrow respawn. Water rune spawn point by ice giants at lvl 46/47 wildy. Muggers drop 2 sets of bones when it should be one Add earth staff spawn somewhere in lava maze 2 Red Spider eggs spawned in Varrock Dungeon, not one. Dark Warriors at Castle were aggressive mobs. Zamorak (higher level) monk drops steel mace and the high level monk is now spawned Nets used to spawn at Bandit Camp. Steel Legs spawn in Red Spider camp at 25 Wildy. Moss Giants dropped more than just Big Bones. There were a lot more lvl 2 Rat/Spiders beside Bandit Camp at the weird place. uncut sapphire at sapphire house 2-3 Giant Spiders at Sapphire house. 2 Black Knights outside of Lava Maze. 1 Guard missing above Falador West Bank. There should be ghosts at lvl 25 wildy all the way to the west Move chaos dwarfs in high level wildy, down a notch out of the beach Add 2 moss giants, a lvl 31 skelly, and a chaos rune respawn in 38 wilderness just a bit west of red dragon maze Remove scorp upstairs in monastary (leaving this here, since were almost at P2P) Highwaymen should drop black capes 100% and be aggressive. Johnny the Beard in Varrock should drop a scroll and coins Mith kite shield should not be sold at the falador shield shop

I’m trying to get someone to write a bot which transverses RSC and just records all objects[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2009, 06:10:20 am[/size][hr][quote author=BuyMyJunk link=topic=394074.msg2929807#msg2929807 date=1251202157]

lol, i like ur idea like walking around rsc and getting every thing pin pointed but that would take a while…

if it was me i would make some kind of rsc bot that out put the location of everysingle object/item in you givin mapview, have it output to a txt file that would make it easier i think

ex: object(xcoords,ycoords,id)

Why not just record it straight into xml?
[/quote]

make a bot for rsc npc drops.
[/quote]
you can just get that from tip.it/rsc but not sure about getting it 100% exact[/quote]
no drop databases have drop rates

Read full topic

item.title: List of RSCD Bugs/Missing features
item.dc:creator: @gawdz666 gawdz666
item.description:
@gawdz666 wrote:

[quote=“xEnt, post:1, topic:297693”]-----RSCD bugs------

huge RSCD memory leak (hint, Tile[][]) " ;)"
fix the dupes that are around (forgot which ones) " ??? "
fix ‘autocatching’/auto following them after a wildy fight. " comment out player.setfollow(affectedplayer)"
fix beers, to only go -1 atk level. wine 3 “invactionhandler”
allow 2 people to mine and get ore at the same time, if they mine before the rock goes empty " gathering all players mining the rock"
Fix rarely when walking to NPC’s or an object it would just stand there, and not execute what it was going to do"???"
when ranging then clicking another npc to range while your ranging, would just stop you (fix to attack new target) — “hint something to do with range event being cancled / restarted”
decrease prayer drain speed by 20% — “hint addPrayerDrain”
fix the ‘disconnect’ problems in crowded areas “hint players in view”
Speed up trading to stop the lag – “peeter posted”
fix not being able to range over water/lava & up/down mountains etc — “hint getNextCoords”[/quote]

elaborated on what he posted.

Read full topic

item.title: List of RSCD Bugs/Missing features
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

@ decrease prayer drain speed by 20%

That’s not the RSCD bug, the RSCD bug is where you can stop prayer draining due to the way prayer was coded. To fix it you have to recode some stuff, which I can’t remember as it was ages ago when I did it. But after that you then need to reduce the rate by 20%

Read full topic

item.title: List of RSCD Bugs/Missing features
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

With the help of the community for RSCAngel, over the past 6 months they have helped tally up the missing F2P content, and bugs.

Since RSCAngel is a F2P (free version) replicate in progress, of RSC. this list does not contain any P2P stuff, it will contain both full F2P, and shared features/bugs between f2p/p2p

Note: this is not everything, i’m sure theres still bugs/missing features F2P out there that i haven’t got to yet, but heres a nice list of what RSCDaemon lacks (from the original)

-----RSCD bugs------

huge RSCD memory leak (hint, Tile[][])
fix the dupes that are around (forgot which ones)
fix ‘autocatching’/auto following them after a wildy fight.
fix beers, to only go -1 atk level. wine 3
allow 2 people to mine and get ore at the same time, if they mine before the rock goes empty
Fix rarely when walking to NPC’s or an object it would just stand there, and not execute what it was going to do
when ranging then clicking another npc to range while your ranging, would just stop you (fix to attack new target)
decrease prayer drain speed by 20%
fix the ‘disconnect’ problems in crowded areas
Speed up trading to stop the lag
fix not being able to range over water/lava & up/down mountains etc

-------Missing Features------------

add the death sound to when you die
add the ‘underattack’ sound in
Aggressive monsters should follow you 4-6 tiles after you run from a fight.
when touching zamorak wine, allow you to actually take it if everyone are dead, if not make them attack you
add a captcha for fatigue
add brother jerred to bless holy symbols
make damage happen when the ranged/magic missile actually hits the target, not instantly.
move banker 1 tile away if standing on him when talking (so your both on a separate tile facing each other)
RE-DO falador barmaid, more RSC-like
certain NPC’s run from combat on low health
synchronize the hit damage in fights more RSC-like
when ranging/maging NPC’s make them run and attack you
shortbow and crossbows have a lower range distance
When ranging, you should face the NPC
different sounds when fighting undead/armored NPCs
add stock system (shop prices vary depending on stock)
make NPC <> Player chat’s show to everyone around you (only above heads)
when 2 rangers shoot 1 person at the same time in wilderness, 1 of their damages gets canceled out
split XP between each person depending on the damage they dealt to an NPC
disallowed following until 3 seconds after the person to follow has left combat
better magic formula (more accuracy/damage on higher magic points)
path validations for missiles (ranged/maging through walls etc)
When you eat cabbage its supposed to say: “You eat the Cabbage. Yuck!”
you get exp from mining gems
set prayer drain to drain slower depending on your prayer points
you should be able to attack someone who is mining.
you should continue mining when getting attacked by an NPC
NPC’s cant finish their walking path if a NPC is in the way
NPC’s can’t finish their walking path if a player is in the way
Player’s cant finish their walking path if an (Aggressive) NPC is in the way
Npcs face players, players face NPCs when interacting with each other
make wyson sell you woad leaves
make wizards mind bomb allow 31 magic to equip rune plate
When mining, it should use the highest level pickaxe that you meet the mining requirements to. (example when u have a rune and iron pickaxe in ur inventory, it always tries to use rune pickaxe, even when ur not 41 mining)
Make “approach” tree, damage you for the trees in Draynor.
Make door to phoenix gangs hideout work.
Allow teleporting during combat
Make fat tony a shop, and sell pizza bases
Make a general store in bandit camp in wilderness, selling general items for free.
Add Crumble undead.
Make the banan guy work on karamja
Add all Confuse type of spells
Make Apothcary work
Make dummy’s work
Allow cooked meat to be cooked again and burn the meat
Make grape+jug of water = wine/bad wine
Make wine/bad wine drinkable
Make dyes mixable, and adding to capes.
setup Aggie to make you dyes.
Added flour/pizza base making with bucket/jug of water.
Added full pizza making
Original items are given to new characters
add customs officer with the original text on karamaja to go back to port sarim
cooking guild hopper is now working.
when you steal a phoenix crossbow, the weaponmaster will attack you now
Make Delrith not attackable
search Drain, say you see a key but cannot quite reach it
cant close chest upstairs fallly chain place
not allow leaving karamaja with karamaja rum (includes teleporting)
add cupboard searching
top floor of morgan’s house in draynor, you are suppose to obtain garlic when searching the cabinet
can now use apple/cookedmeat/redberries with pie shell, to create uncooked pie.
can now use pastry dough with pie dish
add pastry dough making
add bluerite ore mining
disallow ranged/magic against delrith.
cant fill bowls with water at sinks wells or fountains
only suppose to be able too cook bread, pie, cake, and pizzas on range.
can use certain dyes on goblin armour
add muddy key chest that can be unlocked and has items
add stew and cake making
add pastry dough to the menu of water on flour.

----------XMl data stuff-----------

ghosts drop no loot
Spawn tomato and cheese in bandit camp
add bartender upstairs of dalador bar
Add shop (barmaid for falador and upstairs) to sell dwarven stouts, beer, wizard mind bombs.
make black knights and ghosts agressive in wildy
Add rune pickaxe to the pickaxe shop in dwarven mines.
Add addy legs, helmet to their correct shops
Add missing champion guild stairs/ladders, and allow access to it.
Add Rune mace, dagger, short and long to the champs guild guy
Add purple cape, addy chest, black large and legs, to the girl in champs guild.
Add black chest plate to varrock armor shop (if its not already there)
Add highway man to south falador
Add highway man to drop black capes
remove access to spiders at kbd lair
Make both Varrock bartenders sell beer.
Spawn WeaponMaster in Phoenix Gang hideout
Spawn Phoenix Crossbow in the gang’s hideout.
Make WeaponMaster and Highwayman aggressive
add rune legs and chain to scavvo in champs guild
remove addy legs from horvik
johnny the beard should drop a scroll
Steel short should spawn in 68,326.
remove gem trader
added maze key drops to chaos dwarfs
added rune med drops to lessers
add General Bentnoze & General Wartface to goblin village
there are suppose to bears walking around lumby forest, between lumb and draynor.
Added skull to darkwizard spawn up near zamorak monks
add random wizard walking around near highwayman near fally chickens
add another highway man just above draynor
added plank and tile spawn to wildy
added crossbow spawn to wildy
missing egg spawn (119,603)
Battle Axe Shop in Port Sarim (Brian) is suppose to sell Addy Battle Axes as well
Black larges/meds were NOT sold in helmet shop in barb village. same with black legs/skirts were NOT sold in skirt/leg shops in Al Kharid.
add iron dagger to lumby house
there was a spider (level8) in that little hut east from Draynor Village jail
add one lvl 7 goblin near Lumby castle (north-west), between castle and sheeps
mugger should be near Varrock south-west digsite (if it’s not already there, not sure)
there were two spiders (lvl 8, not 100% sure) - one between Draynor Manor and Falador and the other one in that little hut east from Draynor Village jail
add one lvl 7 goblin near Lumby castle (north-west), between castle and sheeps
add 2 lesser demons south of greaters
add raw herring/pike to port sarim fish store
change jug and grape respawn time to 30 sec in cooking guild
add addy short, long, dagger to varrock sword shop
add addy med/large to peksa shop, and legs to louie legs
unicorns still drop horns that cant be picked up (shouldnt be dropped at all) (leaving this here, since P2P is incoming)
Lessers should be south of nature respawn, not southeast of greaters
The bandits with names aren’t aggressive when they should be
Iron bar respawn missing from lvl 16 wild above arrow respawn.
Water rune spawn point by ice giants at lvl 46/47 wildy.
Muggers drop 2 sets of bones when it should be one
Add earth staff spawn somewhere in lava maze

Dark Warriors at Castle were aggressive mobs.
